interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Demolition Man (BD) [Blu-ray]
Review Date: 2019/12/24
Store: Sylvester Stallone  (Actor),     Wesley Snipes  (Actor),     Marco Brambilla  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['Sylvester Stallone and Wesley Snipes go at it amid a dazzling cyber-future in this explosive hit. In 2032 archcriminal Simon Phoenix (Snipes) awakens from a 35-year deep freeze in CryoPrision to find a serene, non-violent Los Angeles ready for the taking. Unable to deal with Phoenix’s brutal 1990s style, officials seek an old-fashioned cop to fight old-fashioned crime. They revive Sgt. John Spartan (Stallone), unjustly serving a CryoPrison sentence because of his last encounter with Phoenix. Sandra Bullock, Benjamin Bratt and Denis Leary also play rough and tough in this “terrific mix of action and humor” (Joel Siegel, Good Morning America/ABC-TV).']
Average Rating: 4.7

Lenkov', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Sly in another great escapist flick. Mr. Snipes, Ms. Bullock and Mr. Bratt ain't bad either.
Review Title: Ahhh! Stallone again.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
The Sapphire Collection (Braveheart/Gladiator/Saving Private Ryan) [Blu-ray]
Mel Gibson  (Actor, Director),     Russell Crowe  (Actor),     Ridley Scott  (Director),     Steven Spielberg  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
["Three of the most critically acclaimed and influential movies of our time in one Blu-ray collection. With 15 Oscar wins between them - This is the set that should be part of everyone's collection. The Sapphire Collection includes: Gladiator, Saving Private Ryan and Braveheart."]
{'Format': 'Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Tom Hanks, Sapphire Collection, Russell Crowe, Matt Damon, Mel Gibson, Ridley Scott, Steven Spielberg, Edward BurnsTom Hanks, Sapphire Collection, Russell Crowe, Matt Damon, Mel Gibson, Ridley Scott, Steven Spielberg, Edward Burns  See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '6.5 x 5.25 x 0.25 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Mel Gibson, Ridley Scott, Steven Spielberg', 'Media Format': 'Widescreen', 'Release date': 'September 11, 2012', 'Actors': 'Mel Gibson, Russell Crowe, Tom Hanks, Edward Burns, Matt Damon', 'Studio': 'Paramount'}
Three great movies for a low price.
Good buy for the price.
Searchers / Wild Bunch / How the West Was Won (Triple-Feature) [Blu-ray]
Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
['SEARCHERS, THE / WILD BUNCH, THE / HOW THE WEST WAS WON', 'The West At Its Best', ']]>']
{'Genre': 'Westerns', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Initial release date': '2012-01-03', 'Language': 'English', 'Studio': 'Studio Distribution Services', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WHV1000261643BR', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Release date': 'January 3, 2012', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '3'}
I got this for the "Wild Bunch", the fact that two other classic westerns were included was icing on the cake.
Great buy for the money.
Judge Dredd [Blu-ray]
Sylvester Stallone  (Actor),     Diane Lane  (Actor),     Danny Cannon  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
['Prepare yourself for the nonstop, action-adventure thrill ride JUDGE DREDD -- exploding onto Blu-ray for the first time, featuring an all-new digital restoration with enhanced picture and sound. Academy Award(R) nominees Sylvester Stallone (Best Actor, 1976, ROCKY) and Diane Lane (Best Actress, 2002, UNFAITHFUL bring the story of a legendary comic book hero to life. In a time when all-powerful "judges" act with supreme authority of both the police force and legal system, Judge Dredd is the most feared law enforcer of them all. When a former judge devises a sinister plot to bring him down, Dredd with stop at nothing to even the scales of justice!']
{'Genre': 'DREDD, SYLVESTER, STALLONE, Action/Adventure, JUDGE', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Armand Assante, Max Von Sydow, Danny Cannon, Rob Schneider, Sylvester Stallone, Diane Lane, Jurgen ProchnowArmand Assante, Max Von Sydow, Danny Cannon, Rob Schneider, Sylvester Stallone, Diane Lane, Jurgen Prochnow  See more', 'Language': 'French (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS-HD High Res Audio), Spanish (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Item model number': '25524900', 'Director': 'Danny Cannon', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 18, 2012', 'Actors': 'Sylvester Stallone, Diane Lane, Armand Assante, Jurgen Prochnow, Rob Schneider', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish, English', 'Studio': 'HOLLYWOOD PICTURES', 'Number of discs': '1'}
What can I say? It's Stallone...with Armand Assante, Joan Chen (hubba, hubba) and Rob Schneider, et al. For me, the scene where Schneider is mimicking Stallone on the way to the penitentiary-"I am the law", still has me rolling on the floor. Cheap thrills, but, I like it.
This one was a "guilty" pleasure for me.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user continues to favor historical and war-themed films while increasingly delving into the action genre. They have a particular enthusiasm for films featuring Sylvester Stallone, indicating a growing appreciation for entertaining and escapist narratives that blend action with humor.

- **Director & Actor Affinity:** The user maintains an interest in acclaimed directors such as Mel Gibson, Ridley Scott, and Steven Spielberg, along with a fondness for films featuring Stallone and other prominent actors like Wesley Snipes and Sandra Bullock. This reflects a consistent preference for both serious storytelling and star-powered action.

- **Format Preference:** The user remains loyal to high-quality media formats, specifically Blu-ray, emphasizing their desire for superior visual and audio experiences that enhance their enjoyment of films, including lighter comedic elements.

- **Value Consciousness:** The user continues to prioritize value in their purchases, showing satisfaction with well-priced items that deliver strong entertainment. Their latest review highlights this trend, as they celebrate the film as a guilty pleasure worth acquiring.

- **Rating Behavior:** The user consistently rates products highly, demonstrating a positive engagement with their selections. Their recent review underscores their appreciation for both quality and the fun factor of their chosen films.

Overall, the user exhibits a refined taste in cinema, balancing impactful storytelling with enjoyment of action-driven guilty pleasures, while maintaining a focus on format quality and value.
